name: The Last Knight (hunterfaugot)
description:
The year is 1977 and Komodo has released its hit arcade game, The Last Knight.

One day while playing... a machine malfunctions...

Get sucked into a 70's arcade game and attempt to escape!

Controls:

arrow keys = move

X = attack

*Gamepad is preferred for better control

Other:

Q = quit

F = toggle fullscreen (windows only)
